actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to clarify that graduate programs in clinical psychology are health professions schools for purposes of title VII of the Public Health Service Act.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide that graduate programs in clinical psychology are health professions schools for the purposes of title VII (Health Research and Teaching Facilities).

titles.title: A bill to clarify that graduate programs in clinical psychology are health professions schools for purposes of title VII of the Public Health Service Act.
